body:
I hoping that she'd be able to escape with only that "THING" attached to her where she'll be in hiding and will be trying to find a way to remove that "THING" without hurting or putting herself in danger but in the end, she couldn't and is now living with that "THING" inside her.

Please don't go savage..... this just popped weeks ago and I forgot to read it. Please author-san, don't kill her. I'm still new to this kind of thing. I only read (past tense) wholesome ones till now.. please don't destroy my expectations.
So where should i place the logo ?? 😂😂
Why is the logo right in front of her face?
